channel.title: Bleach7
channel.description: The First Source for Bleach Information, Media, News and Fan Interaction

item.title: Mini-Release #3 | New Episode Below!
item.description:
Part 1: - All RAW Manga Chapters are online for your downloading pleasure.
Part 2: - Delayed til tomorrow, sorry. Unforseen errors came into play...like me being an idiot.

item.title: Bleach Episode 52 & 53 Special 1 Hour
item.description:
I don't usually post stuff like this, but anyway..
Double Bleach episode 52 & 53 entitled "Renji, Oath of the Soul! Death Match with Byakuya" and "Ichimaru Gin's Temptation, Resolution of Destruction" is now available for download. Links are below as usual.

item.title: Mini-Release #2
item.description: Well...after an incredible interesting afternoon (which happen to consist of me towing a police car to a gas station..w00t!, I have an awesome life dont I.), I finally, a few hours late, got the Second Day release of our Mini-Release week completed and online.

item.title: Mini-Release #1
item.description:
To start off the week full of updates and what-not, I'm giving you several updates.
1) Moderators and up, now have the ability to BAN users from posting in our comment section, for periods of time. If you want to check out an FAQ on what is allowed and what isn't, you can click on this link.

item.title: Happy Birthday Bleach7!
item.description: Well, 1 year come and gone! Only a few grand from 150,000 strong in member count and that's pretty darn good. Alot more than I ever expected. All this week we will be releasing some new things for you guys. But I'm afraid I cant get to it today. I was unexpectedly not at home all day and unable to finish the required tasks before the deadline I set myself. So, we'll make this a mini-release week starting tomorrow. I will also give away the grand prize for September tomorrow and announce the new prizes for October. Thanks for everything, it's all because of you.

item.title: Bleach Ch197 by M7
item.description: Well, after delays again this week.. Here it is and not a moment too soon. I hope you enjoy our release again this week. We managed to make our releases smaller we hope it helps with those of you on dial up or the like. I never realized how much I missed those little bear drawings.
